بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
من ابن أمّ محمّد إلى آمنة سلم عليّك ورحمته أمّا بعد عافاك اللّه
وأبــقــاك وإيّاك وإنّك فإنّك أرسلت إلي بأربعة أوصال كتّان جليل ومائة درهم
ورق وأكون إن أخّرني رحيل الضّاجعة الملحفة وما فضل فاشتري لي
به كتّان وإن النّسّاج لم يستطيع يبقى ينسجها بثمانية أذرع إلّا
بثلثة پصف وإن أحببت عطيتها إيّاك وإن لا فاكتبي
إلي برأيك المحكم وذكري وانظري فيه كان
لي على اللّه توكّل فأمرته سرّرته حتّا حبك مرّتين وإن كان
النّسج الجلّة تصل معه فلترسلي بها وأقري منّي على فليخيم
وأبو حــســن السّلم وعلى أبو قريل وأهله السّلم
من ابن أمّ محمّد إلى آمنة ابنت أسد

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi

In the name of God the merciful and compassionate.
From Ibn Muḥammad to ʾĀmina. Peace be upon you and his (i.e. God's) mercy. As for what follows, may God grant you health From Ibn Muhammad to Aminah. Peace be upon you and His mercy. As for what follows, may God grant you health
and preserve you. You have sent me four lengths of thick flax and a 100 waraq and preserve you, you have sent me four lengths of thick flax and a hundred waraq
dirhams. If I am delayed by the conveyance of the sheep, buy some flax for me from what remains. dirhams. If I am delayed by the conveyance of the sheep, buy some linen for me from what remains. ... und wenn etwas davon (sc. vom Geld) übrigbleibt, dann kaufe für mich damit
The weaver cannot continue weaving in eight cubit (lengths) but (only) The weaver cannot continue weaving them in eight cubit (lengths) but (only)
in (lengths) of three and a half (cubits). If you like I shall give them to you, if not write
to me (to let me know) your considered veiw and make a point of looking into the matter. to me your considered veiw and make a point of looking into the matter.
God was my support and I persuaded him to weave double. If
the large textiles arrive with him send them. Give my best wishes to Palēḵēm the large textiles arrive with him send them. Give my best wishes to Palekhem
and to ʾAbū Ḥasan and ʾAbū Qirīl and his family. and to Abu Hasan and Abu Qiril and his family.
From Ibn Muḥammad to ʾĀmina, daughter of ʾAsad. From Ibn Muhammad to Aminah bint Asad ... ʾUmm Muḥammad...
